translation.en: This program is based on real events.
translation.es: Este programa está inspirado en hechos reales,

translation.en: However, certain characters, names, incidents, locations, and dialogue
translation.es: sin embargo, ciertos personajes, nombres, incidentes, lugares y diálogos han sido novelados con fines dramáticos.

translation.en: have been fictionalized for dramatic purposes.
translation.es: y diálogos han sido novelados con fines dramáticos.

translation.en: Sorry.
What wasn't fictionalized is that my son,
translation.es: Lo que no fue novelado es que mi hijo,

translation.en: at the age of 15, was prescribed OxyContin.
translation.es: a los 15 años, le recetaron OxyContin.

translation.en: He lived in years and years of addiction.
translation.es: Vivió años y años de adicción.

translation.en: And at the age of 32, he died,
all alone in the freezing cold in a gas station parking lot.
translation.es: solo, en el frío congelante del estacionamiento de una gasolinera.

translation.en: And we miss him.
What the fuck?
Sir! Sir! Don't do that, sir. Sir--
- No, I've got it. - No, let me do that, sir.
translation.es: - No, yo me encargo. - No, déjeme hacerlo, señor.

translation.en: There's 220 smoke alarms on the property.
translation.es: Hay 220 alarmas de humo en la propiedad.

translation.en: - You know I can't sleep. - Oh, sir!
- Very important day. - Goodness.
translation.es: - Es un día muy importante. - Dios mío.

translation.en: - I'm so sorry, sir. - I need my rest.
translation.es: - Lo siento mucho, señor. - Necesito descansar.

translation.en: I'm sorry about that. Just please let me do this, sir.
translation.es: Lo siento. Por favor, déjeme hacer esto, señor.

translation.en: Very big day. Dr. Richard needs his rest.
translation.es: Un día importante. El doctor necesita descansar.

translation.en: Why does this keep happening? I put batteries in once a month.
translation.es: ¿Por qué pasa esto? Le pongo baterías una vez al mes.

translation.en: Well done, well done, well done.
- I'll put a new one up there. - Very good job. It's all right.
translation.es: - Pondré una nueva. - Muy buen trabajo. Está bien.

translation.en: Don't worry about that now. Just clean up the mess.
translation.es: No te preocupes por eso ahora. Limpia el desorden.

translation.en: Actually, would you mind checking the rest of them?
Yes, sir.
And whispered in the sound of silence
Thank you for being here, Ms. Flowers. It means a lot to us.
translation.es: Gracias por estar aquí, Sra. Flowers. Significa mucho.

translation.en: I'm Brianna Ortiz.
This is my associate, Bill Havens.
translation.es: Él es mi socio, Bill Havens.

translation.en: - An honor to meet you. - How do you do?
- May I call you Edie? - Ms. Flowers will do.
translation.es: - ¿Puedo llamarla Edie? - Sra. Flowers está bien.

translation.en: Of course. Everything all right with your flight?
translation.es: Por supuesto. ¿Todo bien en su vuelo?

translation.en: - It was fine. - Everything's good-- ?
We can cut the chitchat.
I recognize you're trying to be polite. I've made a note of it. Thank you.
translation.es: Veo que intentan ser educados. Está bien. Gracias.

translation.en: - Oh. I just see that you brought your-- - Yes. I changed my flight to 7:15.
translation.es: - Veo que trajo su... - Sí. Cambié mi vuelo para las 7:15.

translation.en: I'm eager to be home.
But we have the next five hours, so let's make the most of it.
translation.es: Tenemos cinco horas, aprovechémoslas al máximo.

translation.en: - Where are we doing this? Great. - Just down the hall.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde lo haremos? Genial. - Al final del pasillo.

translation.en: What do you want to know?
We'll just get right into it. To the right.
translation.es: Iremos directo al grano. A la derecha.

translation.en: - Welcome. - Great.
Hello. Keep your seat.
All right.
As you probably already know,
every state and dozens of cities and counties are suing Purdue Pharma
translation.es: cada Estado y decenas de ciudades y condados demandan a Purdue Pharma

translation.en: for their role in starting the opioid epidemic.
translation.es: por su papel en iniciar la epidemia de opioides.

translation.en: It's hundreds of lawsuits that would take decades to resolve,
translation.es: Son cientos de demandas que tardarían décadas en resolverse,

translation.en: so we've consolidated those lawsuits into a single case
translation.es: por lo cual consolidamos esas demandas en un solo caso

translation.en: that we believe will bring justice once and for all.
translation.es: que creemos traerá justicia de una vez por todas.

translation.en: Justice? Okay.
We can't bring people back from the dead, but we can make these people pay.
translation.es: No podemos resucitar gente, pero podemos hacer que paguen.

translation.en: So not justice, payment.
translation.es: Entonces no es justicia, es dinero.

translation.en: I don't know why you need me for this.
translation.es: No sé por qué me necesitan para esto.

translation.en: You could come up with a number.
Pick the biggest number you can think of, they will pay it, you can call it a win.
translation.es: Elijan el número más grande que se les ocurra, lo pagarán, y podrán considerarlo una victoria.

translation.en: Ms. Flowers, you might find this frustrating,
translation.es: Sra. Flowers, esto puede parecerle frustrante,

translation.en: and I know you've been through the wringer, but now isn't then.
translation.es: y sé que han sufrido mucho, pero ahora no es entonces.

translation.en: We have good reason to be optimistic about the outcome.
translation.es: Tenemos razones para ser optimistas sobre el resultado.

translation.en: Why are you here?
- You don't look like you want to be. - I made a promise to someone.
translation.es: - No parece que quiera estar aquí. - Le hice una promesa a alguien.

translation.en: But you have access to the same files I did.
translation.es: Ustedes tienen acceso a los mismos archivos que yo.

translation.en: You've seen everything I've seen.
translation.es: Han visto todo lo que yo he visto.

translation.en: We have. But I have quite a few questions I'd like to get through.
translation.es: Así es. Pero tengo varias preguntas que me gustaría hacer.

translation.en: Let's just start with one.
How do you think we got here?
What do I think?
I think you're wasting my time.
translation.es: Creo que me hacen perder el tiempo.

translation.en: And yours.
I know how this ends. I've been here before.
translation.es: Sé cómo termina esto. He estado aquí antes.

translation.en: Would you state your name?
Sir.
Richard Sackler.
You are here today to give testimony in the civil case
translation.es: Y está aquí para dar testimonio en el caso civil

translation.en: pending against Purdue Pharma, makers of OxyContin.
translation.es: contra Purdue Pharma, fabricantes de OxyContin.

translation.en: Dr. Sackler, are you aware of that?
translation.es: Dr. Sackler, ¿está al tanto de eso?

translation.en: That is my understanding.
You deposed Richard Sackler?
I want to make it clear that the appearance of Dr. Sackler here today
translation.es: Quiero aclarar que la aparición del Dr. Sackler

translation.en: is on a voluntary basis.
How did you manage that?
That's it. Go ahead.
I told you, things are different now.
translation.es: Se lo dije, las cosas son diferentes ahora.

translation.en: We're big- game hunting, no mid- level flunkies.
translation.es: Vamos tras los grandes, no lacayos de nivel medio.

translation.en: But we need your help to do it.
translation.es: Pero necesitamos su ayuda para hacerlo.

translation.en: Was...
Was he sitting right here?
- I'm gonna need a different chair. - I'm sorry?
Just get me another chair.
Can you take that chair out of the room please?
translation.es: ¿Pueden sacar esa silla de la sala?

translation.en: Thank you.
- Okay, if you need a moment... - No.
translation.es: - Bien, si necesita un momento... - No.

translation.en: Well, what's next?
When did you first hear about OxyContin?
1998, because of an x- ray machine in Hillsville, Virginia.
translation.es: En 1998, por una máquina de rayos X en Hillsville, Virginia.

translation.en: Well, I am sorry to keep you waiting, Ms. Flowers.
translation.es: Bien, lamento haberla hecho esperar, señora Flowers.

translation.en: So, what seems to be the problem?
Good morning, doctor. I need to see your GE 4225 portable x- ray.
translation.es: Buenos días. Necesito ver su equipo portátil de rayos X, GE 4225.

translation.en: - Oh, so you need an x- ray? - I don't need an x- ray.
You can put the clipboard down. I'm not a patient.
translation.es: Baje el portapapeles. No soy un paciente.

translation.en: Okay.
An appointment is the only way I can get your full attention.
translation.es: Una cita es la única manera de tener toda su atención.

translation.en: and now that I have that,
I am Edie Flowers.
I am an investigator with the U.S. attorney's office in Roanoke.
translation.es: Soy investigadora de la fiscalía de EE. UU. en Roanoke.

translation.en: Part of my job is to track down doctors
translation.es: Parte de mi trabajo es rastrear médicos

translation.en: who bill Medicaid for procedures they don't perform.
translation.es: que cobran a Medicaid por procedimientos que no realizan.

translation.en: That is fraud, not just to Medicaid, but the American taxpayer.
translation.es: Eso es fraude, no solo para Medicaid, sino para los contribuyentes.

translation.en: Before you look at me like that,
translation.es: Antes de que me mire así,

translation.en: trust me when I say it really is in your best interest
translation.es: créame cuando le digo que le conviene

translation.en: to show me that x- ray machine.
translation.es: mostrarme esa máquina de rayos X.

translation.en: Please and thank you.
Oh, boy. Yeah. Yeah, okay.
Yeah. There, uh-- There it is.
But I haven't done anything wrong.
translation.es: Pero no he hecho nada malo.

translation.en: You billed Medicaid for 50 x- rays a day for 30 days straight.
translation.es: Le cobró a Medicaid 50 radiografías por día durante 30 días.

translation.en: Not 49, not 51.
And at $107 per x- ray,
this clinic, which you own, earned $160,500.
translation.es: esta clínica, que es suya, ganó 160 500 dólares.

translation.en: Do I need to call my lawyer?
Why would you need a lawyer if you didn't do anything wrong?
translation.es: ¿Para qué quiere un abogado si no hizo nada malo?

translation.en: - I'll pay it back. - You're gonna pay me back?
Well, whoever, I'll pay them back.
translation.es: Bueno, a quien sea, lo devolveré.

translation.en: Okay, look, I don't want to lose my practice over this. Please.
translation.es: Mire, no quiero perder mi consultorio por esto. Por favor.

translation.en: - There must be some way out of this. - Cooperate.
Okay. Okay, I will. Fine.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Está bien, lo haré. Bien.

translation.en: I need a copy of every invoice over the last two years
translation.es: Necesito copia de las facturas de los últimos dos años

translation.en: and I'll make copies of the files on your computers,
translation.es: y haré copia de los archivos en sus computadoras

translation.en: and if there is anything else I should know, anything at all,
translation.es: y si hay algo más que deba saber, lo que sea,

translation.en: it's best you tell me now because if I find it,
translation.es: es mejor que me lo diga ahora, porque si yo lo encuentro,

translation.en: it will make things much worse for you.
translation.es: empeorará mucho las cosas para usted.

translation.en: Is there anything else I should know?
- Nope. - You sure?
No. No, there is nothing.
There's nothing, I promise.
Then let's see those files.
At first, the only way you heard about OxyContin
translation.es: CAROLINA DEL NORTE Al principio, la única forma de saber sobre OxyContin

translation.en: was if Purdue sent one of their reps to visit your local doctor...
translation.es: era si Purdue enviaba a sus representantes a ver al médico...

translation.en: Chevy going hot. Get her off the lift.
translation.es: El Chevy está caliente. Bájalo de la plataforma.

translation.en: ...and you were unlucky enough to get hurt.
translation.es: ...y tuvo la mala suerte de lastimarse.

translation.en: Damn, little quicker, huh?
Yeah!
Hey, good morning.
- Just having lunch. - Little impromptu lunch, huh?
- Absolutely. - What are you eating?
Salami sandwich.
Yeah, so spare needs to be changed here.
translation.es: Sí, aquí hay que cambiar el repuesto.

translation.en: That hasn't been done. Chevy, get off the lift.
translation.es: Eso no se ha hecho. Bajar el Chevy de la plataforma.

translation.en: - Finish your food and let's go. - We'll get right on it.
translation.es: - Termina tu comida y vamos. - Lo haremos enseguida.

translation.en: Good job, guys. Really good start today.
translation.es: Buen trabajo, chicos. Muy buen comienzo hoy.

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck?
- Ty! Ty! Ty! -
Hey!
Hey! Pace it up!
You've done nothing in an hour.
translation.es: No has hecho nada en una hora.

translation.en: All these engines came out of nowhere and I don't know what to do with them.
translation.es: Todos estos motores salieron de la nada y no sé qué hacer con ellos.

translation.en: This isn't a junkyard we're doing.
Let's get the engines in the bin. I need you in the shop.
translation.es: Pon los motores en el contenedor. Te necesito en el taller.

translation.en: - I will, I will. - Pull focus.
- Okay! All right! - Here we go.
- I believe in you, man. - I believe in me too.
translation.es: - Creo en ti. - Yo también creo en mí.

translation.en: Hey, Mike. Sorry to keep you waiting.
translation.es: Hola, Mike. Siento haberte hecho esperar.

translation.en: Let's get you closed up.
Thanks for waiting, huh?
Come on in.
- Hey, hon. Mike wants to close up. - Hi. Hi, Mike.
translation.es: - Hola, cariño. Mike quiere cancelar. - Hola, Mike.

translation.en: - Hey! - Hi!
- Okay, that comes to... - Oh, who is it?
...167 total.
Yeah. Hold on.
Things have been slow down at the shop so I appreciate the discount.
translation.es: Las cosas están lentas en la tienda, así que te agradezco el descuento.

translation.en: - Oh. No problem. - Discount, hon?
Yeah. You know, that, uh...
You know Maggie left me?
Oh, shoot.
- I did not know that. - Yeah, she took everything but the truck.
translation.es: - No lo sabía. - Sí, se llevó todo menos la camioneta.

translation.en: - Yeah, she took the house. - Oh, yeah?
She took the dog. She had it attack me when I went to get my shoes.
translation.es: Se llevó al perro e hizo que me atacara cuando fui por mis zapatos.

translation.en: You know Rhonda who works at the Chevrolet dealership?
- I know Rhonda. - Not at the front desk.
translation.es: - Conozco a Rhonda. - No la de recepción.

translation.en: Uh, that's who she left me for.
Okay.
- How we doing? - That was intense.
- The discount with Mike? - Oh, come on, he's so sad.
translation.es: - ¿Un descuento a Mike? - Vamos, está muy triste.

translation.en: - - Emotional discounts. I don't know.
translation.es: Descuentos emocionales, cariño. - No sé. - Neumáticos Kryger.

translation.en: Oh, fantastic. Thank you so much. Okay.
- Um-- - What?
Your Accu- turn tire thingy from Italy arrived and is gonna clear Customs
translation.es: Tu neumático Accu-turn de Italia llegó, pasará por Aduana

translation.en: - and get dropped off today at 5:00, yeah. - Italy. Nice.
translation.es: - y lo dejarán hoy a las cinco, sí. - Italia. Bien.

translation.en: How much did that run us?
What was it, like, eight grand?
Eight thousand dollars?
You're the one who wanted a fancy Italian one.
I don't even know what it does.
Honey, just because I want something for $8,000,
translation.es: Cariño, solo porque quiero algo de 8000 dólares,

translation.en: doesn't mean you're supposed to pull the trigger on it.
translation.es: no significa que debas apretar el gatillo.

translation.en: You're joking, right? You're actually joking.
- I'm gonna kick you in your-- Oh, my God. - You're running the books.
translation.es: - Te patearé... Dios mío. - Llevas la contabilidad.

translation.en: - Yeah? - I'm going to kill you.
So, we don't like college, huh?
No college.
There goes your college fund.
- Okay. Okay. - Daddy's being mean.
translation.es: - Está bien. - Papi no habla en serio.

translation.en: - I love you. - You just go and do your thing out there.
translation.es: - Te quiero. - Ve a atender tus cosas.

translation.en: This was supposed to be done yesterday, guys.
translation.es: Esto debía estar hecho ayer, chicos.

translation.en: Get it out, it's ready.
Motherfucker.
- Take them off! Take them off! - Why?
- Come on. - Listen to me.
- I'm fucking around. - Yeah, exactly.
- You're fucking around. No more. - Glen.
Do you know how a T- Rex says hi?
Stop fucking around. Hey. Stop. Stop.
translation.es: Deja de bromear. Oye. Basta. Para.

translation.en: - Stop. - Do you know how the T- Rex eats?
- It goes... - Get the fuck out.
Let's go. Turn it off.
- Turn it the f-- - Ah!
- Hey, shut it down. - I can't understand you.
translation.es: - Oye, apágalo. - No puedo oírte. ¡Apaga eso! No más.

translation.en: Shut it down! No more.
- Hey, get out. - Come on, man.
translation.es: - Oye, sal de ahí. - Vamos, hombre.

translation.en: - I'm just fucking around. - Get out.
- I can do it. Come on. - Stop fucking around.
translation.es: - Puedo hacerlo. Vamos. - Deja de joder.

translation.en: - I gave you a warning. Did I not? - Yes, you did.
translation.es: - Te di una advertencia. ¿No? - Sí, me la diste.

translation.en: Okay, so what happened?
Nothing happened. You're screwing around.
- Turn the machine off, get in the shop. - I took the music off! Listen--
translation.es: - Apaga la máquina, ve al taller. - ¡Apagué la música! Oye...

translation.en: Oh, shit.
- Fuck. - Are you okay? Are you okay?
What is going on?
He fell-- And then the rotator-- - He fell off onto the ground. - Are you okay?
translation.es: Se cayó... Y luego la rotadora... Él se cayó.

translation.en: - Glen, I'm so sorry man, I... - Oh, fuck.
translation.es: - Glen, lo siento mucho, yo... - Mierda.

translation.en: Do you think you can get up? Grab my shoulder.
translation.es: ¿Crees que puedas levantarte? Usa mi hombro.

translation.en: - My back. There's something in my back. - Okay.
translation.es: - Mi espalda. Tengo algo en la espalda. - Está bien.

translation.en: - Let's try and stand up. - Let's try to get up.
I'm so sorry.
- I was just fucking around. - Slow.
- I didn't mean to throw you off. - Ready? One, two, three, come on.
translation.es: - No quise empujarte. - Uno, dos, tres, vamos.

translation.en: - Oh, fuck! - Put him down, put him down!
Okay, go call an ambulance.
translation.es: Está bien, llama a una ambulancia.

translation.en: - Jesus Christ. - My back. Oh, fuck.
translation.es: Por Dios santo. Mi espalda. Carajo.

translation.en: Retractor.
Next, please.
Suction. There's the ligament damage.
translation.es: Succión. Ahí está el daño al ligamento.

translation.en: All right, it's out. There's the bone fragment.
translation.es: Muy bien, listo. Ahí está el fragmento óseo.

translation.en: I spoke with your surgeon. He said home run, everything was great.
translation.es: Hablé con tu cirujano. Dijo que fue un jonrón, todo salió genial.

translation.en: - So now... - Awesome.
...pay attention.
We have to get out of the bed time unt into the med time.
translation.es: Tenemos que pasar de la hora de dormir unt la hora de la medicina.

translation.en: Right? Pay attention. We have the muscle relaxer.
translation.es: ¿Bien? Presta atención. Tenemos el relajante muscular.

translation.en: That's right.
- We have the steroid for the inflammation. - Okay.
translation.es: - Y el esteroide para la inflamación. - Bien.

translation.en: Unt we have the Vicodin for the pain.
translation.es: Unt tenemos Vicodin para el dolor.

translation.en: Thank you.
- With food? - With food. Yeah!
Schnitzel from the pig!
Okay.
So, I will see you next week for a checkup.
translation.es: Te veré la semana que viene para una revisión.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, the 25th.
Glen, you did good. Everything's gonna be fine.
translation.es: Glen, lo hiciste bien. Todo estará bien.

translation.en: - Thanks, Dr. Hartman. - Bye, gang.
Richard attached himself to an endless supply of customers,
translation.es: Richard se conectó a un suministro infinito de clientes,

translation.en: people in pain,
and people with no option other than to get better.
translation.es: y gente cuya única opción era mejorar.

translation.en: Try lifting the feet up, both at a time. Up.
translation.es: Intenta levantar los dos pies. Arriba.

translation.en: It's a little more difficult. A little more advanced. And holding.
translation.es: Un poco más difícil. Más avanzado. Y aguanta.

translation.en: Breathing. Again. Inhale, exhale.
- Lower the legs maybe two inches. - This sucks.
translation.es: - Baja las piernas unos centímetros. - Dios.

translation.en: Why is that so painful?
The muscles are stretching when you do that, okay?
translation.es: Porque los músculos se estiran cuando haces eso.

translation.en: Relax. Excellent. Let's try something different.
- And 90 degrees, holding. - Easy, please.
translation.es: - Y 90 grados, aguanta. - Despacio, por favor.

translation.en: Gently lowering them down a few inches.
And, breathe, breathe, breathe.
- Keeping the back down, flat. - God, this fucking sucks.
translation.es: - Mantén la espalda abajo, plana. - Dios, duele mucho.

translation.en: - Push on my hands. - I can't.
Okay, okay. I know it's frustrating, but you got it.
translation.es: Está bien, está bien. Sé que es frustrante, pero vas bien.

translation.en: You're doing well. Doing really well. This is a long process.
translation.es: Lo estás haciendo bien. Muy bien. Es un proceso largo.

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
I've seen a lot of cases like yours,
translation.es: He visto muchos casos como el tuyo,

translation.en: and you have to know that this is something you're living with now, okay?
translation.es: y tienes que saber que es algo con lo que estás viviendo ahora, ¿sí?

translation.en: Okay.
This is your new reality. And draw the knees up.
translation.es: Esta es tu nueva realidad. Y levanta las rodillas.

translation.en: Let's try five more.
- All the way up. Five more. - Okay.
This isn't just about a pill that killed a lot of people.
translation.es: No se trata solo de una píldora que mató a mucha gente.

translation.en: It's bigger than that.
No, this thing, this plague,
it started when someone in that family
translation.es: comenzó cuando alguien de esa familia

translation.en: realized that the big money in medicine was in sales and marketing.
translation.es: vio que el dinero en medicina estaba en ventas y mercadeo.

translation.en: And lies.
- You're referring to Arthur Sackler? - Yeah.
Arthur Sackler started this whole thing.
He was a psychiatrist at the eve of the pharmaceutical revolution.
translation.es: Era psiquiatra justo antes de la revolución farmacéutica.

translation.en: In those days, the go to move in mental health was a lobotomy.
translation.es: En esa época, moverse en la salud mental era una lobotomía.

translation.en: But lobotomies are a one- shot deal.
translation.es: Pero las lobotomías son de una sola vez.

translation.en: No repeat customers.
Arthur realized with the right pill, he'd have a customer for life.
translation.es: Arthur supo que con la píldora correcta, tendría un cliente de por vida.

translation.en: And he branded the new pill...
translation.es: Y llamó a la nueva píldora...

translation.en: A lobotomy in a bottle.
He found out he was a better salesman than a doctor,
translation.es: Descubrió que era mejor vendedor que médico,

translation.en: so he went out and bought himself two things:
translation.es: así que salió y se compró dos cosas: VENDIDO

translation.en: a drug company
and the country's largest medical advertising agency.
translation.es: y la agencia de publicidad médica más grande del país.

translation.en: He knew that marketing was the future of pills
translation.es: Sabía que el mercadeo era el futuro de las pastillas

translation.en: and he hit the jackpot when they got the contract for Valium,
translation.es: y se sacó la lotería con el contrato del Valium,

translation.en: creating the world's first blockbuster drug.
translation.es: creando el primer fármaco taquillero del mundo.

translation.en: The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.es: El fármaco que nunca supiste que necesitabas.

translation.en: And then he was rich and he wanted everyone to know it.
translation.es: Y luego se hizo rico y quería que todos lo supieran.

translation.en: He bought a bunch of old, fancy art.
translation.es: Compró un montón de arte antiguo y costoso.

translation.en: He put his name on any museum, school or hospital that would take his money,
translation.es: Puso su nombre en cualquier museo, escuela u hospital que aceptara su dinero,

translation.en: and they all did.
I think it made him feel immortal.
translation.es: Pienso que eso lo hizo sentir inmortal.

translation.en: To him, legacy was everything.
translation.es: Para él, el legado lo era todo.

translation.en: Sackler!
He lorded that legacy over his whole family,
translation.es: Dominaba ese legado para toda su familia.

translation.en: and like a lot of families of really rich people,
translation.es: y como muchas familias de gente muy rica,

translation.en: they couldn't wait for him to die.
translation.es: no podían esperar a que falleciera.

translation.en: They wouldn't have to wait long.
- Excuse me. - Yes?
I need to speak to a doctor.
Sir, you need to sign in first over there.
translation.es: Señor, tiene que firmar ahí primero.

translation.en: On May 26, 1987, he drove himself to the emergency room
translation.es: El 26 de mayo de 1987, condujo hasta la sala de emergencias

translation.en: at Columbia Presbyterian Hospital and announced:
translation.es: del hospital Columbia Presbyterian y anunció:

translation.en: My name is Dr. Arthur Sackler. I'm having a heart attack.
translation.es: Soy el Dr. Arthur Sackler. Me está dando un infarto.

translation.en: I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.es: Tengo un bloqueo en la arteria descendente anterior izquierda proximal.

translation.en: I need a balloon angioplasty right now or I won't survive.
translation.es: Necesito una angioplastia con balón o no sobreviviré.

translation.en: Okay, let's start from the top. Let's start from the top. Sir?
translation.es: Bien, empecemos desde el principio. Desde el principio. ¿Señor?

translation.en: - I'm Dr. Arthur Sackler. - Sir, I need you to come back.
translation.es: - Soy el Dr. Arthur Sackler. - Señor, necesito que regrese.

translation.en: I'm having a heart attack.
I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.es: Tengo una obstrucción en la arteria descendente anterior izquierda.

translation.en: I need a balloon angioplasty now or I won't survive.
translation.es: Necesito una angioplastia con balón o no sobreviviré.

translation.en: I'm gonna need you to calm down for a minute.
translation.es: Necesito que se calme un minuto.

translation.en: Sir? Where are you-- ? Sir? Nurse!
Some help here.
Stop wasting time.
I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.es: Tengo una obstrucción en la arteria descendente anterior izquierda.

translation.en: I need the angio--  Let's see what the EKG has to say.
translation.es: - Necesito una angio... - Veamos el electrocardiograma.

translation.en: Stop wasting time. Do what I say.
translation.es: Deje de perder tiempo. Haga lo que digo.

translation.en: - You're doing great. -
Well, it looks like-- Hey, you were right.
translation.es: Bien, parece que... Oiga, tenía razón.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm always fucking right.
translation.es: Sí, siempre tengo la maldita razón.

translation.en: Oh, boy.
Time of death 7:58 p.m.
Arthur may have created the modern pharmaceutical business
translation.es: Arthur pudo haber creado el negocio farmacéutico moderno

translation.en: and made the family millions, but it was his nephew, Richard,
translation.es: y hacer que la familia ganara millones, pero fue su sobrino, Richard,

translation.en: who unleashed a monster...
Right this way, Dr. Sackler.
...and made them billions.
It would take 10 years,
but... I think the passing of some mantle from Arthur to Richard
translation.es: pero... creo que pasar el cetro de Arthur a Richard

translation.en: was the beginning of OxyContin.
And now that Arthur was out of the picture,
translation.es: Y ahora que Arthur había desaparecido,

translation.en: Richard had a plan.
But first he needed one key ingredient,
translation.es: Pero primero necesitaba un ingrediente clave,

translation.en: and the only thing that stood in his way was a big dysfunctional family.
translation.es: y lo único que se interponía en su camino era una gran familia disfuncional.

translation.en: - What's the point of talking about this? - How long is this going to take?
translation.es: - ¿Qué sentido tiene hablar de esto? - ¿Cuánto tiempo llevará esto?

translation.en: - Stanley, we need to know what's going on. - Let him talk!
translation.es: - Stanley, necesitamos saber qué pasa. - ¡Déjenlo hablar!

translation.en: We're trying! Goddamn it, Stanley, what are we getting?
It seems that Arthur hypothecated a great deal of art and money over the years.
translation.es: Parece que Arthur hipotecó una gran cantidad de arte y dinero durante años.

translation.en: What the hell does hypothecated mean?
It means he owes money. And not just money, art.
translation.es: Significa que debe dinero. Y no solo dinero, arte.

translation.en: There are some sizable debts to Harvard, the Met, the Smithsonian, Columbia...
translation.es: Hay deudas considerables con Harvard, el Met, el Smithsonian, Columbia...

translation.en: And who's going to pay that?
Well, Arthur had several businesses and he added your names to many of them.
translation.es: Arthur tenía varios negocios y agregó sus nombres a muchos de ellos.

translation.en: - All right, which businesses? - Okay.
Uh, Douglas McAdams, Medical Tribune International,
Napp Pharmaceuticals, MD publications...
- Have you-- ? - I've never heard of--
...Medimetriks, Purdue Frederick MRS, IMS, MSCDC.
I haven't heard of any of these businesses.
translation.es: No he oído de esas empresas.

translation.en: Your names are all over them.
I suggest you liquidate to pay these debts because, as I said, they are sizable.
translation.es: Sugiero que liquiden estas deudas porque como dije, son considerables.

translation.en: - Stanley, was Dad broke? - No, no, no. Well, maybe.
translation.es: - Stanley, ¿papá estaba en quiebra? - No. Bueno, tal vez.

translation.en: - Take Purdue. - That's a terrible idea.
translation.es: - Quédate con Purdue. - Esa es una idea terrible.

translation.en: They're going to divide it all up so that we get little pieces? No.
translation.es: ¿Van a dividirlo todo para darnos migajas? No.

translation.en: Give them everything and exchange it for Purdue.
translation.es: Dales todo y cámbialo por Purdue.

translation.en: Purdue's got only one drug that's worth anything, MS Contin.
translation.es: Purdue solo tiene un fármaco valioso, MS Contin.

translation.en: Right now, it's a niche drug for people who are dying of cancer.
translation.es: Ahora es un fármaco usado para quienes están muriendo de cáncer.

translation.en: When the patent runs out, we got fuck all.
translation.es: Cuando se venza la patente, no tendremos nada.

translation.en: You were in there, you got fuck all now.
Purdue is a real company, bought by you and Arthur.
translation.es: Purdue es una empresa real, comprada por Arthur y tú.

translation.en: They actually make something. Those people in there don't understand.
translation.es: Ellos hacen algo. Esa gente no entiende.

translation.en: They've never made anything in their entire lives except fucking chitchat.
translation.es: Nunca han hecho nada en toda su vida excepto charlar.

translation.en: No! No! We're not gonna--
We'll let them eat canapés, we'll make something.
translation.es: Dejaremos que se entretengan, haremos algo.

translation.en: Yeah, but you've never brought a drug to market, son.
translation.es: Sí, pero nunca has sacado un fármaco al mercado.

translation.en: It takes a decade, and we've got nothing in the pipeline.
translation.es: Toma una década y no tenemos nada en proceso.

translation.en: - It's a dead end. - We know pain.
translation.es: - No hay salida. - Conocemos el dolor.

translation.en: Yeah, that's for damn sure.
We developed MS Contin, we understand pain.
translation.es: Desarrollamos MS Contin, entendemos el dolor.

translation.en: I understand pain.
All of human behavior is essentially comprised of two things:
translation.es: El comportamiento humano está compuesto por dos cosas:

translation.en: running away from pain and toward pleasure.
translation.es: Huir del dolor y correr hacia el placer.

translation.en: It's a cycle.
Run from pain, run toward pleasure.
translation.es: Huir del dolor, correr hacia el placer.

translation.en: Pain, pleasure, pain, pleasure.
Again and again.
Well, this circle is our existence.
It is the very essence of what it means to be human, to be alive.
translation.es: Es la esencia misma de lo que significa ser humano, estar vivo.

translation.en: But if we place ourselves right there, between pain and pleasure...
translation.es: Pero si nos ubicamos aquí, entre el dolor y el placer...

translation.en: If we become the gatekeepers for everyone who wants to get away from pain,
translation.es: Si nos convertimos en guardianes de todos los que quieren huir del dolor,

translation.en: then we have changed the world.
We finish what Arthur started.
And you will never have to worry about money ever again.
translation.es: Y nunca más tendrán que preocuparse por el dinero.

translation.en: - Fuck yeah. - Yeah.
Purdue goes on to develop one of the most powerful painkillers
translation.es: Purdue desarrolla uno de los analgésicos más poderosos

translation.en: to ever hit the market, while telling us it's perfectly safe.
translation.es: del mercado, mientras nos dice que es perfectamente seguro.

translation.en: Besides money, what do you think motivated Sackler?
translation.es: Aparte del dinero, ¿qué cree que motivó a Sackler?

translation.en: Napoleon was short, so he conquered Europe.
translation.es: Napoleón era bajo, y así conquistó Europa.

translation.en: Batman's Batman because his parents got killed.
translation.es: Batman es Batman porque mataron a sus padres.

translation.en: - Is that what you're asking? - Yeah.
In college, he tried inventing a pill that could give you an orgasm.
translation.es: En la universidad, intentó inventar una píldora que provocara un orgasmo.

translation.en: He loved vacationing in Thailand.
His favorite vegetable is the asparagus, and I don't give a shit the motivation.
translation.es: Su vegetal favorito eran los espárragos. No me importa la motivación.

translation.en: It doesn't matter because he did it.
translation.es: No importa porque él lo hizo.

translation.en: I'm sure even if you knew the reason, it wouldn't make you feel any better.
translation.es: Y aunque supieran la razón, no se sentirían mejor.

translation.en: What about you, Ms. Flowers?
What motivated you?
The only thing I had: work.
That's it? Just work?
Just work.
Yes, yes, yes!
Shake your tambourine and blow...
Fuck! Come on.
Shit.
Shit.
Shit, shit, shit.
You have reached the Tomb Raider helpline. - The charge is two d-- -
translation.es: Se comunicó con la línea de ayuda de Tomb Raider. El cargo es dos...

translation.en: - Hi, it's Edie. - Hello, Ms. Edie. How are you?
translation.es: - Hola, soy Edie. - Hola, Sra. Edie. ¿Cómo está?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm about two minutes into Level 14.
translation.es: Sí, llevo dos minutos en el Nivel 14.

translation.en: In Atlantis, in the pool room, and I don't know how to get through it.
translation.es: En Atlantis, en la sala de billar, y no sé cómo pasar.

translation.en: I've died 16 times.
Hello?
You need to move across the space two times.
translation.es: Debe moverse por el espacio dos veces.

translation.en: - First, you spring the traps. - Hang on. Mm- hm.
- Then you get out of the-- - Okay. I got it.
translation.es: - Luego salga del... - Bien. Lo tengo.

translation.en: Well done. Now turn to your left, climb the tallest block and jump to the...
translation.es: Bien hecho. Ahora gire a la izquierda, suba al bloque más alto y salte...

translation.en: There's a dragon up ahead at the third column.
translation.es: Hay un dragón adelante, en la tercera columna.

translation.en: - Thank you. - My pleasure, Ms. Edie.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Es un placer, Sra. Edie.

translation.en: - If there's anything else I can do... - No.
translation.es: - Si hay algo más que pueda... - No.

translation.en: I'm good. Good night.
Or good morning, wherever you are.
translation.es: O buenos días, dondequiera que estés.

translation.en: I am a bureaucrat.
Bureaucracy is what holds us together.
translation.es: La burocracia es lo que nos mantiene unidos.

translation.en: It's what keeps society organized, functioning, moving.
translation.es: Mantiene a la sociedad organizada, funcionando, en movimiento.

translation.en: There's no civilization without bureaucracy.
Spreadsheets are what keep the world from collapsing, and...
translation.es: Las hojas de cálculo evitan que el mundo colapse y...

translation.en: I was good at my job.
translation.es: Yo era buena en mi trabajo.

translation.en: Chuck baby don't give a what...
translation.es: Al bebé Chuck no le importa...

translation.en: I'll need a copy of every invoice over the last two years.
translation.es: Necesito copia de las facturas de los últimos dos años.

translation.en: Green for legitimate charges.
Anything else you think I should know?
Yellow for fraudulent charges I was already aware of,
translation.es: Amarillo para cargos fraudulentos de los que ya sabía,

translation.en: and red, red is when I was lied to.
translation.es: y rojo, rojo es cuando me mintieron.

translation.en: - There is nothing. - You sure?
I promise.
Chuck baby don't give a...
translation.es: Al bebé Chuck no le importa...

translation.en: When the red came out, that tended to turn things fun for me.
translation.es: Cuando salió el rojo, las cosas se volvieron divertidas para mí.

translation.en: By 1998, not a lot of people had heard of OxyContin.
translation.es: Para 1998, no mucha gente conocía el OxyContin.

translation.en: Even if you had, you probably had no clue what it could do.
translation.es: Aunque así fuera, no tenían idea de lo que podía hacer.

translation.en: And that was the idea.
It was essential to Richard's plan.
translation.es: Era esencial para el plan de Richard.

translation.en: Now that the Sacklers had Purdue,
translation.es: Ahora que los Sackler tenían a Purdue,

translation.en: they needed to find a drug they could sell.
translation.es: debían encontrar un fármaco que pudieran vender.

translation.en: A blockbuster.
And Richard was making a big bet on pain.
translation.es: Y Richard apostaba mucho al dolor.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, good boy.
Here you go, good boy.
Aren't you such a good boy?
Such a good boy. Are you ready?
Are you ready to make the donuts with me? Are you ready to make some money, Unchie?
translation.es: ¿Listo para divertirte conmigo? ¿Estás listo para ganar dinero, Unchie?

translation.en: I love you so much.
That's it. That's it, boy. Come on, boy. Come on.
translation.es: Eso es. Eso es, chico. Vamos, chico. Vamos.

translation.en: Good morning. Good morning.
Come on, boy. That's a good boy. You're a good boy.
translation.es: Vamos, chico. Buen chico. Eres un buen chico.

translation.en: You're such a good boy. I'll pick you up for now.
translation.es: Eres un buen chico. Te cargaré por ahora.

translation.en: But he wasn't starting from scratch.
For over 15 years, Purdue had been making and marketing
translation.es: Por más de 15 años, Purdue había fabricado y comercializado

translation.en: a morphine- based painkiller called MS Contin.
translation.es: un analgésico a base de morfina llamado MS Contin.

translation.en: So OxyContin just needed a little recipe tweaking.
translation.es: OxyContin solo necesitaba un pequeño ajuste en la receta.

translation.en: MS Contin has two elements.
Of course, there's the Contin,
our candy coating that dissolves slowly in the digestive tract...
translation.es: nuestra capa de caramelo que se disuelve lentamente en el tracto digestivo

translation.en: - Mm- hm. - ...which gives the system it's time- release property.
translation.es: lo que le da al sistema su tiempo de liberación.

translation.en: And then there's the milk chocolatey center,
translation.es: Y luego está el centro chocolatoso con leche,

translation.en: morphine sulfate, MS--
And when we developed MS Contin,
was there any plan for a second generation?
translation.es: ¿había algún plan para una segunda generación?

translation.en: - No. - Why not?
Because morphine works well.
It's well- understood
which made it relatively easy to get approval from the FDA.
translation.es: e hizo que fuera relativamente fácil obtener la aprobación de la FDA.

translation.en: Well, morphine is not the only opiate that works well.
translation.es: La morfina no es el único opiáceo que funciona bien.

translation.en: It is the only opiate that's associated with death.
translation.es: Es el único opiáceo asociado con la muerte.

translation.en: I would like to make a painkiller that people associate
translation.es: Me gustaría hacer un analgésico que la gente asocie

translation.en: with improved well- being, with life.
translation.es: con el bienestar mejorado de la vida.

translation.en: Let's make something new.
Can you do that?
This was the birth of a bad idea.
translation.es: Esto fue el nacimiento de una mala idea.

translation.en: - Sure. - Then do it.
They took one type of heroin wrapped in a time- release coating
translation.es: Tomaron un tipo de heroína envuelta en una capa de liberación prolongada

translation.en: and swapped it for a much stronger one.
translation.es: y la cambiaron por una mucho más fuerte.

translation.en: I like it.
It's a little dangerous.
Be careful.
But I like it.
Okay...
I'll say a word
and you say the first thing that comes into your minds.
translation.es: y ustedes dirán lo primero que se les ocurra.

translation.en: Anyone can go first. All right.
Codeine.
Dentist.
Cough syrup.
Wisdom teeth.
Sleep aid.
- Fever. - Ah. Thank you.
Now, what about morphine?
Death.
Cancer.
Addicts.
Severe pain.
All right, now tell me what words you associate with oxycodone.
translation.es: Bien, díganme cuáles palabras asocian con oxicodona.

translation.en: Is... Is that Percocet?
Oxy, it's like a pulmonary thing.
translation.es: Oxi es como una cosa pulmonar.

translation.en: Like, oxygen?
Hey. What the hell?
Something the matter?
You see? You see, they all have an idea about morphine,
translation.es: ¿Ves? Todos tienen una idea sobre la morfina,

translation.en: but oxycodone is a clean slate.
translation.es: pero la oxicodona es un nuevo comienzo.

translation.en: Nobody has any associations with it. We can make it whatever we want.
translation.es: Nadie lo asocia con nada. Podemos hacer lo que queramos.

translation.en: So you want to take a drug with twice the kick of morphine
translation.es: ¿Quieres hacer un fármaco con el doble de morfina

translation.en: and give it to everybody?
Yes. Yes, I do.
Abuse is gonna be a real issue.
translation.es: El abuso será un problema real.

translation.en: When a patient is under the supervision of their physician,
translation.es: Cuando un paciente está bajo la supervisión de su médico,

translation.en: these drugs are incredibly safe.
If I may, I don't think that's entirely accurate.
translation.es: No creo que eso sea del todo cierto.

translation.en: - Even with MS Contin, we saw abuse of-- - Yes, yes, yes. All right.
translation.es: - Incluso con MS Contin, vimos abuso de... - Sí, sí. Muy bien.

translation.en: So we are going to take a very powerful drug
and put it into the hands of potentially millions of new people?
translation.es: y lo pondremos en manos de potencialmente millones de personas nuevas?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, that's right.
Under the care of their physician.
translation.es: Bajo el cuidado de su médico.

translation.en: And with full FDA approval.
translation.es: Y con la aprobación total de la FDA.

translation.en: Here.
Look at this.
Doctors currently prescribe morphine here
because morphine is death.
But with oxycodone, our new patients are here.
translation.es: Pero con oxicodona, nuestros nuevos pacientes están aquí.

translation.en: This is the moment
I think this whole thing could've been stopped.
translation.es: creo que todo esto podría haberse detenido.

translation.en: If Raymond or Mortimer or anyone else had just said no,
translation.es: Si Raymond, Mortimer o alguien hubiera dicho que no,

translation.en: you and I would not be talking
and there would be a lot of people at dinner with their families right now.
translation.es: y habría mucha gente cenando con sus familias en este momento.

translation.en: I know you're scared. I know you're concerned.
translation.es: Sé que están asustados. Sé que están preocupados.

translation.en: This story is a tragedy.
But we're gonna give a lot of people their lives back.
translation.es: Pero le devolveremos la vida a mucha gente.

translation.en: We're gonna take away a lot of pain.
What do we call it?
OxyContin.
The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.es: El fármaco que nunca supiste que necesitabas.

translation.en: The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.es: El fármaco que nunca supiste que necesitabas.

translation.en: Richard had his designer drug.
What do you think?
OxyContin was born.
Richard had his big idea:
a drug that people in need could not refuse.
translation.es: un fármaco que la gente necesitada no podía rechazar.

translation.en: And that was only half the plan, and not even the worst half.
translation.es: Y esa era solo la mitad del plan, ni siquiera la peor mitad.

translation.en: This is where Uncle Arthur's influence came in.
translation.es: Aquí entró la influencia del tío Arthur.

translation.en: He was a salesman
and knew your product is only as good as the message it comes with.
translation.es: y sabía que un producto es tan bueno como el mensaje que transmite.

translation.en: Richard knew exactly what that message was,
translation.es: Richard sabía exactamente cuál era el mensaje

translation.en: and more importantly, how to send it.
translation.es: y lo más importante, era cómo enviarlo.

translation.en: He went about putting together a sales force
to get the word out about OxyContin.
translation.es: para correr la voz sobre OxyContin.

translation.en: They recruited good- looking college graduates
who could speak a doctor's language,
translation.es: que hablaban el idioma del médico

translation.en: and then they programmed the shit out of them.
translation.es: y luego los programaron a su antojo.

translation.en: Temperature, heart rate, respiratory rate, and blood pressure.
translation.es: Temperatura, ritmo cardíaco, ritmo respiratorio y presión arterial.

translation.en: These are known as the vital signs. Do you know what is not a vital sign?
translation.es: Se conocen como signos vitales. ¿Sabes qué no es un signo vital?

translation.en: Pain.
Pain is the last thing a medical professional will consider
translation.es: El dolor es lo último que un profesional médico consideraría

translation.en: when they care for you.
Or your grandmother.
Or your boyfriend.
- Hello, Frank. - Shannon.
Pain has long been understood to be a symptom of injury or disease,
translation.es: El dolor es considerado como síntoma de una lesión o enfermedad,

translation.en: not something to treat in and of itself.
translation.es: no es algo para ser tratado per sé.

translation.en: Hey! So, you're just gonna sit there and eat Cap'n Crunch all day?
translation.es: ¡Oye! ¿Te sentarás ahí a comer cereal todo el día?

translation.en: Finish the car.
- When I'm done. - When you're done?
Three full bowls of fucking Cap'n Crunch.
- Tires ain't going nowhere. - You're a degenerate.
translation.es: No pasa nada. Eres un degenerado.

translation.en: You're gonna blow up my toilets with that Cap'n Crunch.
- It's disgusting! I'm taking it. - I'm playing.
I'm taking it and turning it off. Get out, go on.
translation.es: Me lo llevo y lo apago. Fuera, eso es.

translation.en: Doctors don't respect pain.
translation.es: Los médicos no respetan el dolor.

translation.en: - Because they don't understand it. -
translation.es: Gerente Regional de Ventas Porque no lo entienden.

translation.en: A medical education is what, seven years?
Do you know how much direct instruction medical students receive on pain?
translation.es: ¿Saben cuánta instrucción sobre el dolor recibe un estudiante de medicina?

translation.en: Forty- eight minutes.
Patients don't need to adjust their lives to deal with pain.
translation.es: Los pacientes no necesitan ajustar su vida para lidiar con el dolor.

translation.en: Doctors need to adjust their treatment of it.
translation.es: Los doctores necesitan ajustar su tratamiento.

translation.en: Pain is no longer something that we have to tolerate.
translation.es: El dolor ya no es algo que tengamos que tolerar.

translation.en: It is something we can overcome.
- Hi. - Here you go.
My name is Shannon.
- Thank you. - You got it.
We have a way to overcome it.
We have an answer.
OxyContin.
That's the answer.
If you're a good fit for us,
you will join our crusade to help change the way Americans deal with their pain.
translation.es: te unirás a nuestra cruzada para ayudar a cambiar la forma en que las personas lidian con su dolor.

translation.en: At Purdue, we've spent years developing OxyContin.
translation.es: En Purdue, pasamos años desarrollando OxyContin.

translation.en: An effective, long lasting and safe treatment for pain
translation.es: Un tratamiento efectivo, duradero y seguro para el dolor

translation.en: with broad application to a wide range of patients.
translation.es: aplicado a una amplia gama de pacientes.

translation.en: But you'll have to do more than sell this treatment.
translation.es: Pero tendrán que hacer más que vender este tratamiento.

translation.en: You will be convincing doctors to take pain seriously.
translation.es: Convencerán a los médicos de que se tomen en serio el dolor.

translation.en: Make no mistake.
You will be part of a beautiful, glorious,
translation.es: Serán parte de una hermosa, gloriosa,

translation.en: wonderful revolution of life transformation.
translation.es: y maravillosa revolución de la transformación de la vida.

translation.en: Say it with me:
- Beautiful. - Beautiful.
- Wonderful. - Wonderful.
- Glorious. - Glorious.
- Revolution. - Revolution.
- And life transformation. - Life transformation.
translation.es: - Y transformación de la vida. - Transformación de la vida.

translation.en: One more time!
- Beautiful. - Beautiful.
- Wonderful. - Wonderful.
- Glorious. - Glorious.
- Revolution. - Revolution.
- And life transformation! - Life transformation!
translation.es: - ¡Y transformación de la vida! - ¡Transformación de la vida!

translation.en: You made the right decision. You know that, right?
translation.es: Tomaste la decisión correcta. Lo sabes, ¿verdad?

translation.en: - For sure. - Are you excited?
Totally.
You were really good up there.
- Thank you. - Seriously.
Hey, can I ask you a question?
I was wondering when my first paycheck will arrive.
translation.es: Me preguntaba cuándo tendré mi primer sueldo.

translation.en: What do you need?
Just need to know when I'm gonna get paid.
translation.es: Solo cuándo me van a pagar.

translation.en: Because you're broke and you need a place to live.
translation.es: No tienes dinero y necesitas dónde vivir.

translation.en: You can stay with me.
A bunch of the other girls did when they were trying to get on their feet.
translation.es: Muchas otras lo hicieron cuando intentaban arrancar.

translation.en: We'll get money in your pocket and then find you a place to live.
translation.es: Tendrás dinero en el bolsillo y también dónde vivir.

translation.en: Seriously, I have an extra room.
- Really? - Really.
- Thank you. - You're welcome.
- Let me ask you a question. - Yeah?
Do you have MS or scoliosis or something?
translation.es: ¿Tienes esclerosis múltiple, escoliosis o algo así?

translation.en: - No. - All right. Then stand up straight.
translation.es: - No. - Muy bien. Entonces párate derecha.

translation.en: Don't walk around like this.
You deserve to be here.
Deon Dyer snapping the tie and gives the Tar Heels the lead...
translation.es: Deon Dyer rompe el empate y le da ventaja a los Tar Heels...

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
Oh, fuck. God.
Fuck, shit.
Lil, I need you for a sec. Can you come here for a second?
translation.es: Lil, te necesito un segundo. ¿Puedes venir un momento?

translation.en: I got a treat.
Yep, that's what just happened.
translation.es: Sí, eso fue lo que pasó.

translation.en: Just a bunch of piss.
- This is just-- - What did you do?
I spilled a bottle of piss all over myself.
translation.es: Me derramé una botella de orina encima.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Okay.
- It's a lot. - It's everywhere. Cute.
- Okay. - Oh, thanks.
- Can I help? Can I do something? - Can you grab me-- ?
Ty, come here for a sec.
- Come get a good look at this. - No, it's fine.
translation.es: - Ven a ver esto. - No, está bien.

translation.en: Can you grab me a couple towels? Can you lift your butt for me?
translation.es: ¿Me pasas algunas toallas? ¿Puedes levantarte un poco?

translation.en: I changed Kaylee. You could've timed it better.
- This is ridiculous. - You're so gross.
I hear make out sounds and there's pee involved, so that's, you know...
translation.es: Oigo ruidos y hay pis, así que...

translation.en: You may want to stay in the bedroom.
Do you want me to give you a sexy sponge bath?
translation.es: ¿Te provoca un baño sexi con esponja?

translation.en: God, it's just...
You're fine.
Okay?
- Look at me. - I just can't stop laughing.
translation.es: - Mírame. - No puedo dejar de reírme.

translation.en: I know. You're gonna be fine.
That's the best view in Ohio.
translation.es: Es la mejor vista de Ohio.

translation.en: Here's your bedroom.
Make yourself at home.
And use all those drawers, they're all yours.
translation.es: Y usa todos esas gavetas, son tuyas.

translation.en: - It's great. - I hope you like purple.
translation.es: - Es genial. - Espero que te guste el púrpura.

translation.en: Yeah, I love purple.
This is our bathroom, we'll share it.
translation.es: Este es nuestro baño, lo compartiremos.

translation.en: Toilet, steam shower.
That bath tub is amazing.
And that's a Moroccan Rose bath oil, you can use it.
translation.es: Y eso es aceite de rosas marroquí, puedes usarlo.

translation.en: This is the living room, obviously, and up there is the private roof deck
translation.es: Esta es la sala, obviamente, y arriba está la terraza privada

translation.en: with a killer fucking Jacuzzi.
You got a car?
Uh, yeah, it's my mom's, but I'm using it right now.
translation.es: Sí, es de mi mamá, pero lo estoy usando.

translation.en: All right, we'll get you a parking permit.
translation.es: Te conseguiré un permiso de estacionamiento.

translation.en: - Do you have cash? - Not so much.
We'll get you some cash.
This is a big fucking day.
Yeah.
Let's celebrate.
- You like champagne? - Yeah.
Cheers.
Thank you.
To your new life, Shannon Shaeffer.
translation.es: Por tu nueva vida, Shannon Shaeffer.

translation.en: You've never had champagne, have you?
Here.
Hey, I just really-- I wanna thank you for this opportunity--
translation.es: Oye, de verdad... Quiero agradecerte esta oportunidad...

translation.en: First thing we gotta do is fix this. You look like a show pony.
translation.es: Primero, debemos arreglar esto. Pareces un poni de feria.

translation.en: We gotta get you some new clothes.
Smell this.
- Are you serious? - Yeah. Smell it.
It's imported leather from Italy. What's that smell like?
translation.es: Es cuero importado de Italia. ¿A qué huele?

translation.en: - Oh, imported leather from Italy. - No.
translation.es: - A cuero importado de Italia. - No.

translation.en: It smells like money.
Smell it again.
Yeah, it's good.
Oh, you have amazing legs.
You have a great figure.
- I don't know about that. - You're hot as shit.
translation.es: - No lo creo. - Eres muy sexy.

translation.en: - Step right in. Lily, Glen. - Thank you for seeing us so quickly.
translation.es: - Adelante. Lily, Glen. - Gracias por recibirnos tan rápido.

translation.en: I'm glad to see you always.
So, how are you doing, champ?
Not so great.
It doesn't look like it.
- Feeling pretty rough? - You could say that.
Okay. Well, have a look at this chart.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Bueno, mira este cuadro.

translation.en: On a scale of one to 10, where would you say your pain is?
translation.es: En una escala del uno al diez, ¿dónde dirías que está tu dolor?

translation.en: - I'd say a five or s-- - No, it's a nine.
translation.es: - Diría que un cinco o se... - No, es un nueve.

translation.en: He's feeling like crap and he's not sleeping,
translation.es: Se siente muy mal y no está durmiendo,

translation.en: which means that I'm not sleeping.
translation.es: lo que significa que yo no duermo.

translation.en: - So... - Not sleeping.
Yeah. Whatever you gave me is not working anymore.
translation.es: Sí. Lo que sea que me diste ya no funciona.

translation.en: No? I gave you Vicodin. It's pretty standard.
translation.es: ¿No? Te di Vicodin. Es bastante estándar.

translation.en: But I'd like to start you on something new.
translation.es: Pero me gustaría darte algo nuevo.

translation.en: It's called OxyContin.
It's similar to Vicodin,
but it lasts a full 12 hours without wearing off.
- That would be good. - All right, so...
translation.es: - Eso estaría bien. - Muy bien, entonces...

translation.en: you will take one in the morning.
You'll take one before you go to bed,
so there will be no waking up in the middle of the night in pain.
translation.es: para que no te despiertes en medio de la noche con dolor.

translation.en: - And I'll get some sleep? - The best.
- We'll all get sleep. - You will both get the best sleep ever.
translation.es: - Todos dormiremos. - Ambos dormirán como nunca.

translation.en: - It's safe? Okay. - As safe as any other opioid.
translation.es: - ¿Es seguro? Bien. - Tanto como cualquier otro opioide.

translation.en: The good news is, you don't have to take it as often.
translation.es: La buena noticia es que no tienes que tomarlo tan seguido.

translation.en: - Okay. - All right?
- Let's try it. - I trust you, Doc.
Get out of here. Go sleep, go sleep better.
translation.es: Ahora vayan a dormir. Que duerman mejor.

translation.en: Oh, oh, Glen.
I should warn you there is one possible side effect.
translation.es: Debo advertirte que hay un posible efecto secundario.

translation.en: - What? - The constipation.
Yeah?
- All right. - Go sleep.
I think we can handle that.
All right. Constipation.
I need to speak to Dr. Coyle, please.
translation.es: Necesito hablar con el doctor Coyle.

translation.en: - And you are? - Edie Flowers.
Oh, fuck me.
You motherfucker.
So, I asked you if there was anything else I needed to know, and you said no, right?
translation.es: Le pregunté si tenía algo más que decirme y dijo que no, ¿cierto?

translation.en: - Yeah. Right. - You're not being honest with me.
translation.es: - Sí. Claro. - No está siendo sincero conmigo.

translation.en: - I told you everything. Everything. - You prescribed a new drug,
translation.es: Le dije todo. Recetó un nuevo fármaco,

translation.en: one I've never even heard of, 1,098 times in six months.
translation.es: uno que ni siquiera conozco, 1098 veces en seis meses.

translation.en: That's more prescriptions than there are patients, and nearly 5% of Carroll County.
translation.es: Son más recetas que pacientes y casi el 5 % del Condado Carroll.

translation.en: What we both know is that those patients don't exist
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que estos pacientes no existen

translation.en: and that you are running some dumb, idiotic, little stupid jackass scheme.
translation.es: y que está tramando un plan tonto, idiota, estúpido e imbécil.

translation.en: Now, I gave you a chance.
translation.es: Muy bien, le di una oportunidad.

translation.en: Now it's gonna hurt.
Okay. Just wait a second, okay?
Dr. Coyle, what can you tell me about OxyContin?
translation.es: Doctor Coyle, ¿qué puede decirme sobre el OxyContin?

translation.en: What Purdue did, what Richard Sackler did,
translation.es: Lo que Purdue y Richard Sackler hicieron

translation.en: abusing the trust between a doctor and their patient...
translation.es: abusando de la confianza entre un médico y su paciente...

translation.en: selling hope to the most vulnerable people,
translation.es: vendiendo esperanza a la gente más vulnerable,

translation.en: that's sick on a whole other level.
translation.es: eso es enfermizo al máximo nivel.

translation.en: And then Richard Sackler combined two of the most addictive substances:
translation.es: Y luego Richard Sackler combinó dos de las sustancias más adictivas:

translation.en: greed and opium.
And when you understand that...
When you understand that,
then your brain will never be able to reconcile it.
And you will never see the world the same.
translation.es: Y nunca verás el mundo del mismo modo.
